runs.comm: takes off for a quick single to midwicket.. Sarfraz was a little hurried by the pace
quick delivery, 141 kph, it's short of length and it's rising.. the batsman defends it towards gully awkwardly
length delivery on the stumps, pushed to mid-off for a quick single
short and wide outside off, Sarfraz chases it but makes no connection.. it's wide enough for the umpire to stretch his arms
repeat of the previous ball but just inside the line, Sarfraz misses his cut shot
beaten this time by the outswinger as Sarfraz pushes away from the body
back of length delivery on off, the batsman defends it to mid-on
quick again! This is back of length and swings away to beat the bat. Zia looks for a punch, misses it completely
he has punched that brilliantly! Doesn't get behind the line but swings his bat to hit it on the up through covers
tries to repeat the shot.. no movement of the feet again from the batsman.. gets a thick outside edge to third man
he gets plenty of width and cashes on it, cutting it powerfully over point .. It wasn't far from the fielder but that was flying away
low full toss, Sarfraz looks to just time it through covers but hits it straight to the fielder
shortish delivery on off, Sarfraz plays the upper cut to guide it to third man
he bowls this one at 143 kph on off stump, Sarfraz defends it to off
back of length delivery and rising on the batsman, Sarfraz wants to clip it to the leg side but is surprised by the pace.. his hand comes off the handle as he fends it to backward square leg
no movement of the feet as Zia looks to punch this back of length delivery to off, gets inside edge to square leg
fires a length delivery on the off and middle line, defended to midwicket
he goes down on the knee to play the sweep over fine leg but makes no connection. Brave choice of shot against a bowler zipping them in
slower bouncer this time, fended off to short fine leg
he aims for wide long-on boundary but ends up hitting it over mid-off. Gets four runs but Zia was beaten by pace there.. hits the edge of the bat and flies over the infield
outside edge but this lands short of the keeper. Zia is not interested in moving his feet, looks to push this through off
just brings his bat down behind the line and pushes it to mid-off with no timing.
good wheels from Milne.. Sarfraz defends the short of length delivery to the off side
he has been beaten outside off quite often today. Some extra bounce for Milne outside off
makes room by moving to the leg side but can't do much as this one is on to him too quickly, 143 kph.. Can only push it to mid-on
he wants to hit it big but he gets absolutely no timing.. The mid-on fielder was quite close and it just eludes him. The pace is troubling these openers
he walks way over to the off side to play the ramp shot. .but it's  a quick yorker outside off.. It hits the boots and is deflected to the left of the keeper
shortish delivery outside off, it's the slower one.. Sarfraz leaves it alone as it was too high. The umpire doesn't think so. It was way high over the batsman
now he gets into the swing of things, whacking this length delivery over wide mid-on. Not the best timing but this has enough on it
here comes the sweep! He is good at that. Too good. ABdV does that all the time. Goes down on his knee to the fast bowler and scoops it over the fine -leg boundary. Superb shot
length delivery on off, he steers it straight to point
the batsman pushes it towards midwicket with soft hands and they come back for the second as the field is spread
full and outside off, the batsman drives it straight to cover
full and flighted, the batsman punches it to long on for a single
pushed through outside off, the batsman drives it straight to cover
superbly chipped over midwicket! He comes out of the crease and whips it over the infield, straight into the gap
more runs, this time it's more of an outside edge. It was wide outside off and Sarfraz throws his bat at it, the thick edge flies through slip and down to the boundary
floated on the pads, the batsman misses his flick and gets hit on the pads. Strangely, it's been called a wide

loud appeal for lbw as the batsman plays across the line and misses, he is hit on the knee roll. The umpire thinks he is fine there.. Close one. Would have hit the middle but the impact was marginally outside off
he whips this one to deep midwicket to get off strike
he steps out of the crease and punches the tossed up delivery down to long on
waits in the crease and pushes it to cover for a quick single
quicker delivery, Sarfraz whacks it firmly down to long on
slower this time, the batsman dabs it to the off side and thinks of a single, but Devcich charges in from backward point to prevent the run
goes down on the knee to sweep, but this is a short ball.. flies over his head
loud appeal for caught behind but the umpire doesn't think so. It was another short ball and Sarfraz misses his intended cut. Only the bowler appealed there
slower delivery now, Sarfraz is beaten yet again
Sarfraz's upper cut almost carries to the man at third-man.. It was a slower bouncer and it flies off the face. Just lands short of the fielder
he makes room and wants to play the pull, but is surprised by the pace and bounce. The ball hits the top of the bat and lobs towards mid-off but just lands short
length delivery on the stumps, nudged away to midwicket for a single

he takes a step down the crease and dabs the quicker delivery towards point for a quick single.. Devcich fires in the throw at the non-striker's end and Nathan takes the bails off. That looks out. He is gone here. That is sloppy running from Zia because he had enough time. May be he just didn't expect that throw to come in so quick. NZ have a wicket here even though only the bowler looked interested in that appeal initially. Superb work by the fielder. Zia is short by an inch
sweeps this one to short fine leg where Mitch McClenaghan makes a good diving stop
tossed up on off, driven to long off roa n easy single
comes down the pitch and pings the gap at cow corner again! He was never looking for anything else, goes across the line and gets a lot of power behind that shot
now the sweep, but Hafeez doesn't want to risk a second with Devcich charging at the ball at deep square leg
comes down the pitch and pushes it to midwicket
the beard is everywhere! The batsman punches it off the back foot but now the Devcich dive saves a run at point
looks to whip the back of length delivery to leg side from outside off, but gets a thick inside edge on to his pads
the batsman is quick on the pull this time, swivels early to play it to deep square leg
length delivery on the stumps, the batsman pushes it to midwicket, thinks of a single.. but Taylor fires in a throw.. Hafeez could have been in trouble as he lost the bat while trying to get back
fuller delivery on the stumps, 150 kph, Sarfraz pushes it to midwicket

another one is gone! Ronchi hits the stumps direct and sends Hafeez back. It was a short delivery, hit the ribs as Sarfraz missed the pull - it was too quick - but the batsmen tried to steal a single as the ball rolled to the left of the keeper. Didn't work
this is as slow as they will get from a NZ seamer today.. 118 kph.. Sarfraz lets loose a powerful drive and crashes it past a diving cover fielder
short ball this time but makes no impression, Sarfraz whacks it through midwicket for boundary no. 2 from the over
he picks this one up from wide outside off, sweeps it to that gap at deep midwicket again
slower delivery outside off, Sarfraz knows he has missed out.. he drives but finds the man at cover
whoa! Sarfraz reaches his half-century with a murderous slog over midwicket.. It was a length ball but Sarfraz jabs at it.. just clears the boundary
now goes down on his knee to this length ball and sweeps it fine, the fielder at fine leg does well to prevent the boundary
they are taking it easy against Milne now. It's 149.5 kph on the stumps, Sarfraz pushes it through midwicket calmly
that was a quick quick yorker! Sohail was lucky it missed off stump, 151 kph.. He was just too late in brining his bat down. Superb delivery
fuller delivery on off, the batsman slices it to Devcich at point
length delivery on off stump, 147 kph, the batsman defends it to the leg side
shortish delivery but the batsman is on the task, he pulls this 149 kph delivery through wide mid-on for his first runs.. four of them
length delivery but this is on the pads, the batsman pushes it to deep midwicket for a couple
he comes down the pitch immediately but doesn't get the timing, hits the low full toss to wide long on
flatter and quicker on off, the batsman dabs it towards the vacant midwicket area for a quick single

he sweeps this one to deep square leg and wants second.. but Sohail sends him back, The throw comes in to the keeper, who fires it at the non-striker's and the two take an extra run. It would have been trouble for Sarfraz had Ronchi hit
comes down the pitch and punches it down the ground
calmly punches the flatter delivery to long on for a single
steps out of the crease and pushes the fuller delivery to deep midwicket for a single
bowls a slower one this time, 116 kph, the batsman flicks it to fine leg for a single
goes wide of the crease and delivers a low full toss at 150 kph, punched straight to cover
back of length outside off, sliced to third man with ease
fires it in towards the stumps, 152 kph, Sarfraz pushes it to midwicket for an easy single
no rush from the batsman as he dabs this length delivery to midwicket for a quick single
slower bouncer to end his spell, Sarfraz leaves it alone
smartly punched over the non-striker's head! Straight bat and beautiful timing
short of length delivery outside off, Sarfraz cuts it away to deep point

whacked into the hands of midwicket! This was a slower delivery and Sohail spotted it early, he went after it but didn't get the elevation at it.. Straight into the hands of McCullum who doesn't flinch
he is off the mark with a dab down to third man off a slower delivery
he doesn't move about in the crease, just squeezes the low full toss through point
he chops it firmly on to the adjacent pitch and over the point fielder thereafter
serves up a full delivery for Umar, who is never going to miss out on those.. He leans forward and crashes it through cover
oh sweet! This is full on the middle stump line and Umar just flicks it over midwicket with ease.. Just timing there
slower delivery outside off, he chops it straight to point
slower delivery on the pads, the batsman tucks it behind square on the leg side for a single
bowls a low full toss on the stumps, Sarfraz whips it to deep midwicket for an easy single
on the pads, Umar tickles it fine on the leg side, it races away once it beats the man at short fine leg
he looks to whack it through midwicket but gets a bit of inside edge to deep square leg
slower and on the stumps, the batsman dabs it to the leg side and calls for a quick single
comes down the pitch, takes it on the full but hits it straight to midwicket
takes it on the full again but doesn't get the proper timing, couple to wide long on
comes down the pitch and slogs it across the line to deep midwicket
clears his front leg and clubs it to deep midwicket
slower bouncer, calmly clipped away to fine leg for a single
superb slower delivery, beats the bat and bounces short of the keeper to beat him too.. it deflects to fine leg
another slower delivery, bowled with a grunt. The batsman nudges it to backward square leg for another single
comes down the pitch and gets a full toss, slices it to deep point
short delivery, Sarfraz doesn't help himself by coming down the pitch.. Misses his pull shot
fuller delivery on the stumps, clipped to deep midwicket
tossed up delivery, that is murdered over the bowler's head. One bounce and four. Pakistan one shot away now
paddles this to the left of short fine leg for a quick single
quicker delivery on the stumps, nudged to the right of midwicket for another single
pushes this one wide outside off, the batsman, looking for the wide, leaves it alone
he waits in the crease and chops it towards point for another single
tucked away to square leg for another single
superb hit! It's full on the stumps and Umar Akmal just deposits it over long on with a beautiful straight hit. Pakistan win this comfortably. Just one ball for Neesham then...
